subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps’s attempt to win his eighth gold medal will not be totally under his control at the Beijing Games, since he would have to do it in the 4x100-meter medley relay Sunday.
snippet: Michael Phelps’s attempt to win his eighth gold medal will not be totally under his control at the Beijing Games, since he would have to do it in the 4x100-meter medley relay Sunday.
